data.name: Guardians of Hyelore Demo
data.detailed_description:
Battle your way through waves of enemies in a non-stop effort to destroy the opposing enemy towers! The Tower Rush Demo is packed with unique elements of recruitment and battle mechanics as you progress through the first five stages of the game. You are granted four units to hire in demo. Fight against powerful Threats, upgrade your Guardians, purchase powerful items, gain Talents, and play through the first region available in the demo: Spring Valley.

Key Features:

  • Recruit Scouts, Conjurers, Clerics, and Wardens in the demo version.
  • Purchase weapons, potions and other consumables.
  • Favor system.
  • Talent system.
  • Shop system.
  • Stats system.
  • Leaderboards.
  • Guardians with diverse and upgradeable abilities.
  • Achievements and Arena mode have been disabled in the demo.

data.short_description: Tower Rush is an action-packed unit recruitment survival game pitting your units against an onslaught of enemies. Hire units, learn new abilities, gain Talents, earn Achievements, and much more! The demo version allows you to play through the first five stages of Tower Rush.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: As an action fighting game, Tower Rush has a cartoon-themed depiction of unit and enemy deaths and brief display of blood during the death animations.
